products.title: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £151.50 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Add a smart, contemporary finish to your chosen room with this appealing modern pattern. Featuring eye-catching curvaceous abstract leaves with a subtle white outline on a rich azure blue background, Boheme PVC Blackout Azure Blue double-sided blind is bound to gain many compliments. Flame retardant, this electric roller blind is made out of a blackout fabric, so it won’t let light escape into your room, especially on a bright morning. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1974 Fabric Colour: Azure Blue Material: 3 Ply Vinyl, 1 Ply Fibreglass Lining: Pattern Match Backing - See Sample Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Whitby Blackout PVC Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Whitby Blackout PVC Navy Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue. Made to measure from £161.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Whitby PVC Blackout Navy Blue is a fabulous boys’ blind in dark navy that features a super modern cityscape of houses and trees that really lends itself well to a contemporary space.The electric operation makes opening and closing this flame retardant blind super-easy and the blackout fabric prevents unwanted light travelling into your room on a bright day. What's more, it's made of moisture resistant material so you don't have to worry if it gets splashed with water. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home. 
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1993 Fabric Colour: Navy Blue Material: 29% PVC 71% Fibreglass Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Quackers PVC Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Quackers PVC Blackout Blue Electric Roller Blind in Yellow/Blue/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £161.20 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
Instantly add something fun and quirky with Quackers PVC Blackout Blue electric roller blind. It's is made of moisture resistant fabric so is ideal for a children’s room or bathroom, it features a selection of amusing rubber duckies sitting on top of blue pebbles. The flame retardant electric blind operation makes it easy to open and close and with blackout fabric, the children won’t be disturbed by early morning light. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.  
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1991 Fabric Colour: Blue Material: 29% PVC 71% Fibreglass Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes

products.title: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind
products.metadescription: Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue Electric Roller Blind in Blue/Multicoloured. Made to measure from £163.62 with FREE UK mainland delivery. This Electric Roller Blind includes 5-year guarantee and child safety features.
products.productdescription:
With a restful, Japanese floral pattern, this electric roller blind delivers an air of Zen. Intricate watercolour florals sit on graceful branches coloured in soft grey with hint of blue on a white background. Cherry Blossom Blackout Kimono Blue blackout roller blind adds the perfect finishing touch to an elegant, simple room. The blind is finished in a fabulous blackout faux silk fabric and it is Pollergen™ treated using a specialist finish that helps to relieve hayfever symptoms by neutralising pollen. Pair your electric roller blinds with the Smart Hub and operate your blinds with your Amazon Alexa or with Google Home.
 
 Product ID: DB-ERBX1995 Fabric Colour: Kimono Blue Material: 80% Polyester 20% Cotton Lining: White Backing Headrail: Durable Aluminium Roller Tube Supported By White Steel Brackets - Top, Face or Side Fix     Control Type: Electric Control Battery Powered Energy Saving Rating: ER3 - Highest Energy Saving Value - UV Protection and Effective Thermal Retention Blackout: Yes
